TopicTitle: How do I get the Mun?

Articles.Content:
Hi all.

New here and I\'ve got what is probably a horribly dumb question. But where do I get the Mun add-on? I\'m assuming it\'s some sort of download because it certainly doesn\'t appear in the game that I\'ve got.

I\'m in awe of what all you experts can accomplish with this game. Thanks in advance for the help!
You need to download the experimental release-it\'s on the downloads page at the main site, under the stable release.
